text: Janet Lilly (born August 15, 1957) is an American modern dancer and choreographer. She was a principal dancer for a company from 1983 to 1991. She is now at University of North Carolina at Greensboro college of visual and performing arts. Lilly was born in Iowa City, Iowa. == Awards == *2008â€“2009 Fulbright Lecturer Award *2001 National Endowment of the Arts Creation and Planning Grant ==References== Category:1957 births Category:American dancers Category:American choreographers Category:Actors from Iowa City, Iowa Category:Living people
title: Janet Lilly
